SEARCH
Package it.polimi.GC13.network.rmi

Class RMIConnectionAdapter

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.GC13.network.rmi.RMIConnectionAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientInterface, ServerInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class RMIConnectionAdapter extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ServerInterface, ClientInterface
RMIConnectionAdapter represents an RMI (Remote Method Invocation) adapter that implements both ServerInterface and ClientInterface. It acts as a bridge between the client-side and server-side communication using RMI.

This adapter maintains an executor service for handling asynchronous tasks related to message sending and processing. It interacts with RMIServerInterface to register messages from clients and ClientDispatcher to handle messages from the server.

See Also:

    • startRMIConnection

      public ServerInterface startRMIConnection(String hostName, int port, ConnectionBuilder connectionBuilder) throws IOException
      Starts the RMI connection by looking up the server stub in the RMI registry and setting up necessary components.
      Parameters:
      hostName - The hostname of the RMI server.
      port - The port number of the RMI server.
      connectionBuilder - The connection builder for managing connection-related tasks.
      Returns:
      The server interface for further interaction.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O exception occurs while setting up the connection.
